st: Humari Har Khushi Ka Ehsaas Tumhara Ho
s:
Humari Har Khushi Ka Ehsaas Tumhara Ho
Tumhare Hr Ghum Ka Dard Hamara Ho,
Mar Bhi Jayein Tu Humein Koi Ghum Nhi,
Bus Aakhri Waqt Saath Tumhara Ho…!!!

st: Apki Dosti Pe Naaz Hai Humein
s:
Apki Dosti Pe Naaz Hai Humein
Kal Tha Jitna Bharosa Utna Aj Hai Humein!
Dost Woh Nahi Jo Khushi Mein Sath De
Dost Wahi Jo Har Pal Apnepan Ka Ehsas De!!!

st: Ek Karb E Wafa Musalsal Mujhe Sone Nahi Deta
s:
Ek Karb E Wafa Musalsal Mujhe Sone Nahi Deta
Dil Sabar Ka Aadi Kabhi Rone Nahi Deta
Mein Uska Hoon Yeh Raaz Tu Woh Jaan Gaya Hai
Wo Kis Ka Hy Ehsaas Ye Hone Nahi Deta

st: Teri Doori Ka Ehsaas Jab Satane Laga
s:
Teri Doori Ka Ehsaas Jab Satane Laga
Tere Sath Guzra Har Lumha Yaad Aane Laga
Jab Bhi Bhulane Ki Koshish Ki
Tu Dil Ke Or Kareeb Aane Laga

st: Mere Naseeb Main Tu Nahin Shayad
s:
Mere Naseeb Main Tu Nahin Shayad
Kyun Khel Aisa Taqdeer Ka Hota Hai
Lakerain Nahi Milti Hain Unse
Jin Se Ye Dil Milta Hai
Duniya Kehti Hai
Chand Lamhun Ka Saath Tha
Ye Dil Jaanta Hai
Ye Umar Bhar Ka Ehsaas Tha !!!

st: Basa Hai Ankhoon Main Apka Chehra Is Tarah
s:
Basa Hai Ankhoon Main Apka Chehra Is Tarah
Gulab Mein Khushboo Basi Hoti Hai Jis Tarah
Namaz Parh Li Ho Or Dua Na Mangi Ho
Aap Ki Kami Mehsoos Hoti Hai Kuch Is Tarah

st: In Faslon Ki Fikar Main Kyon Karon Bhala
s:
In Faslon Ki Fikar Main Kyon Karon Bhala
Bahot Door Reh Ke Bhi Mere Paas Hai Koi,
Is Soch Mein Dooba Hai Bahot Dair Se Mera Dil.
Kia Uske Dil Mein Bhi Aisa Ehsaas Hai Koi?

st: Yaar Ne Dil Ka Haal Batana Chor Diya
s:
Yaar Ne Dil Ka Haal Batana Chor Diya
Hum Ne Bhi Gehrai Mein Jana Chor Diya
Jab Us Ko Hi Dori Ka Ehsaas Nahi
Hum Ne Bhi Ehsaas Dilana Chor Diya

st: Udas Na Hona Kyun Ke Main Saath Hoon
s:
Udas Na Hona Kyun Ke Main Saath Hoon
Samnay Na Sahi Par Aas Pass Hoon
Aankhon Ko Band Karo Dil Se Yaad Karo
Mein Hamesha Aap Ke Liye Ek Ehsas Hoon

st: Ho Sakta Hai Humein Anjane Mein Unhein Rula Diya
s:
Ho Sakta Hai Humein Anjane Mein Unhein Rula Diya
Unhune Dunya Ke Kehne Par Humein Bhula Diya
Hum Tu Waise Bhi Aakele The
Kya Howa Agr, Unhein Ehsaas Dila Diya !!!

st: Bad gaya tha pyas ka ehasas dariya dekh kar
s:
Bad gaya tha pyas ka ehasas dariya dekh kar
hum palat aaye magar pani ko pyasa dekh kar
hum bhi hain shayad kisi bhataki hui kashti ke log
chikhane lagate hain khvabon mai jazira dekha kar
jis ke jitani haisiyat hai usake nam utana khulus
bhik dete hain yahan ke log kasa dekh kar
mangate hain bhik ab apne muhallon mai faqir
bhuk bhi muhatat ho jati hai khatra dekh kar
khudkushi likhi thi ek beva ke chehare par magar
phir wo zinda ho gayi bacha bilakata dekh kar

st: Har Dil Ko Kisi Na Kisi Dilbar Ka Intezaar Hota Hai
s:
Har Dil Ko Kisi Na Kisi Dilbar Ka Intezaar Hota Hai
Kayi Saari Raahon Se Gujarte Yeh Jeevan Paar Hota Hai
Har Pal Dil Sapne Bunta Hai Tanhaiyon Ke Saaye Mein
Mohabbat Se Hi To Yaaro Jeene Ka Ehsaas Hota Hai…

st: Ik Karb E Wafa Musalsal Mujhe Sone Nahi Deta
s:
Ik Karb E Wafa Musalsal Mujhe Sone Nahi Deta
Dil Sabar Ka Aadi Kabhi Rone Nahi Deta
Main Uska Hoon Ye Raaz To Woh Jaan Gaya Hai
Woh Kis Ka Hai Ehsaas Ye Hone Nahi Deta

st: Ho Sakta Hai Humne Anjaane Me Unhe Rulaa Diya
s:
Ho Sakta Hai Humne Anjaane Me Unhe Rulaa Diya
Unhone Duniya Ke Kehne Par Hume Bhula Diya
Hum Toh Waise Bhi Aakele The
Kya Huva Agar, Unhone Ehsaas Dila Diya

st: Basa Hai Ankhoon Main Apka Chehra Is Tarah
s:
Basa Hai Ankhoon Main Apka Chehra Is Tarah
Gulab Main Khushbo Basi Hoti Hai Jis Tarah
Namaz Parh Li Ho Aur Dua Na Mangi Ho
Ap Ki Kami Mehsoos Hoti Hai Kuch Is Tarah

st: Dil Tota Hai Maira Par Ass Nai
s:
Dil Tota Hai Maira Par Ass Nai
Us Ka Ehsas Hai Par Pas Nai
Judaii Ka Dard Zaroor Hai Hum Ko
Laikin Itna B Khas Nai

st: Kaash Ye Dil Shishe Ka Bana Hota,
s:
Kaash Ye Dil Shishe Ka Bana Hota,
Chot Lagti To Beshak Ye Fanah Hota.
Par Sunte Jab Wo Aawaz Iske Tutne Ki,
Tab Unhe Bhi Apne Gunah Ka Ehsaas Hota

st: Aapki Dosti Pe Naaz Hai Hame
s:
Aapki Dosti Pe Naaz Hai Hame
Kal Tha Jitna Bharosa Utna Aaj Hai Hame!
Dost Wo Nahi Jo Khushi Me Sath De
Dost Wahi Jo Har Pal Apnepan Ka Ehsas De!!!

st: Raat Si Tanha Khamoshi Hai Mere Dil Mein
s:
Raat Si Tanha Khamoshi Hai Mere Dil Mein
Shayad Kuch Jazbaat Ki Kami Hai Iss Dil Mein
Pehle To Hum Harr Baat Par Haste Ya Rote The
Par Ab Shayad Koi Ehsaas Hi Nahi Hai Mere Dil Mein!!

st: Na Gham Hai Na Hai Ehsaas Khushi Ka
s:
Na Gham Hai Na Hai Ehsaas Khushi Ka
Na Deed Hai Na Hai Intezaar Kisi Ka
Main Tu Akela Chal Raha Hoon Andheron Main
Ab Tu Ye Bhi Yaad Nahi Kab Hua Tha Samna Rosheni Ka
